name: Parsing error found when parsing the template

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Dynamic References Secure Strings are only supported for a small set of resource properties. Validate that they are being used in the correct location when checking values and Fn::Sub in resource properties. Currently doesn't check outputs, maps, conditions, parameters, and descriptions.

name: Check for SubscriptionFilters have beyond 2 attachments to a CloudWatch Log Group
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E2529] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: The current limit for a CloudWatch Log Group is they can have 2 subscription filters. We will look for duplicate LogGroupNames inside Subscription Filters and make sure they are within 2. This doesn't account for any other subscription filters getting set.

name: SnapStart supports the configured runtime

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure CloudFormation properties that require at least one property from a list. More than one can be included.

This issue is raised by the rule [E3030] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

name: Validate we aren't configuring read only properties
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3040] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Read only properties can be configured in a CloudFormation template but they aren't sent to the resource provider code and can cause drift.

name: RecordSet HostedZoneName is a superdomain of or equal to Name
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3041] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: In a RecordSet, the HostedZoneName must be a superdomain of or equal to the Name being validated

name: Validate at least one essential container is specified
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3042] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check that every TaskDefinition specifies at least one essential container

name: Validate parameters for in a nested stack
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3043] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Evalute if parameters for a nested stack are specified and if parameters are specified for a nested stack that aren't required.

name: ECS service using FARGATE or EXTERNAL can only use SchedulingStrategy of REPLICA
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3044] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using a TargetType of Fargate or External the SchedulingStrategy has to be Replica

name: Validate AccessControl are set with OwnershipControls
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3045] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using AccessControl other than private you must also configure OwnershipControls. The default is bucket owner enforced which disables ACLs.

name: Validate ECS task logging configuration for awslogs
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3046] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'awslogs' the options 'awslogs-group' and 'awslogs-region' are required

name: Validate ECS Fargate tasks have the right combination of CPU and memory
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3047] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using a ECS Fargate task there is a specfic combination of memory and cpu that can be used

name: Validate ECS Fargate tasks have required properties and values
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3048] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using a ECS Fargate task there is a specfic combination of required properties and values

name: Validate ECS tasks with dynamic host port have traffic-port ELB target groups
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3049] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using an ECS task definition of host port 0 and associating that container to an ELB the target group has to have a 'HealthCheckPort' of 'traffic-port'

name: Check if REFing to a IAM resource with path set
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3050] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Some resources don't support looking up the IAM resource by name. This check validates when a REF is being used and the Path is not '/'

name: Validate the structure of a SSM document
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3051] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: SSM documents are nested JSON/YAML in CloudFormation this rule adds validation to those documents

name: Validate ECS service requires NetworkConfiguration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3052] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using an ECS task definition has NetworkMode set to 'awsvpc' then 'NetworkConfiguration' is required

name: Validate ECS task definition is has correct values for 'HostPort'
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3053] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: The 'HostPort' must either be undefined or equal to the 'ContainerPort' value

name: Validate ECS service using Fargate uses TaskDefinition that allows Fargate
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3054] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using an ECS service with 'LaunchType' of 'FARGATE' the associated task definition must have 'RequiresCompatibilities' specified with 'FARGATE' listed

name: Check CreationPolicy values for Resources
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3055] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check that the CreationPolicy values are valid

name: Validate that CloudFront TargetOriginId is a specified Origin
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3057] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: CloudFront TargetOriginId has to map to an Origin Id that is in the same DistributionConfig

name: ValidationDomain is superdomain of DomainName
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3503] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: In ValidationDomainOptions, the ValidationDomain must be a superdomain of the DomainName being validated

name: Check minimum 90 period is met between BackupPlan cold and delete
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3504] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check that Backup plans with lifecycle rules have >= 90 days between cold and delete

name: Validate identity based IAM polices
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3510] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: IAM identity polices are embedded JSON in CloudFormation. This rule validates those embedded policies.

name: Validate IAM role arn pattern
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3511] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate an IAM role arn pattern matches

name: Validate resource based IAM polices
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3512] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: IAM resources polices are embedded JSON in CloudFormation. This rule validates those embedded policies.

name: Validate ECR repository policy
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3513] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Private ECR repositories have a policy. This rule validates those policies.

name: Validate the structure of a StateMachine definition
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3601] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate the Definition or DefinitionString inside a AWS::StepFunctions::StateMachine resource

name: Validate the period is a valid value
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3615] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Valid values are 10, 30, 60, and any multiple of 60.

name: Validate ManagedBlockchain instance type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3617] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the ManagedBlockchain instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate a DocDB DB Instance class
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3620] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the DocDB instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate the instance types for AppStream Fleet
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3621] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the AppStream Fleet instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate EC2 instance types based on region
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3628] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the EC2 instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate Lambda event source mapping StartingPosition is used correctly
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3633] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'EventSourceArn' is associate to Kinesis, Kafka, or DynamoDB you must specify 'StartingPosition

name: Validate Lambda event source mapping starting position is used with SQS
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3634] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'EventSourceArn' is associated to SQS don't specify 'StartingPosition'

name: Validate Neptune DB instance class
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3635] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the instance types for Neptune DB based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate DynamoDB BillingMode pay per request configuration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3638] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'BillingMode' is 'PAY_PER_REQUEST' don't specify 'ProvisionedThroughput'

name: When BillingMode is Provisioned you must specify ProvisionedThroughput
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3639] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'BillingMode' is 'Provisioned' 'ProvisionedThroughput' is required

name: Validate DynamoDB SSE Specification has required properties when using KMS
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3640] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When doing KMS encryption in an AWS DynamoDB table there are required properties.

name: Validate GameLift Fleet EC2 instance type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3641] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the GameLift Fleet EC2 instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate ElastiCache cluster cache node type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3647] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the ElastiCache instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate Elasticsearch domain cluster instance
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3652] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the Elasticsearch instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: RestApi requires a name when not using an OpenAPI specification
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3660] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using AWS::ApiGateway::RestApi you have to provide 'Name' if you don't provide 'Body' or 'BodyS3Location'

name: Validate Route53 health check has AlarmIdentifier when using CloudWatch
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3661] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When 'Type' is 'CLOUDWATCH_METRIC' you must specify 'AlarmIdentifier'

name: Validate Lambda environment variable names aren't reserved
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3663] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Lambda reserves a set of environment variable names for its use. This rule validates that the provided environment variable names don't use the reserved variable names

name: Validate RedShift cluster node type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3667] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the RedShift instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate the instance types for an AmazonMQ Broker
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3670] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the instance types for AmazonMQ broker based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate block device mapping configuration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3671] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Certain volume types require Iops to be specified

name: Validate the cluster node type for a DAX Cluster
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3672] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the DAX cluster instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate if an ImageId is required
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3673] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate if an ImageID is required. It can be required if the associated LaunchTemplate doesn't specify an ImageID

name: Validate EMR cluster instance type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3675] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the EMR cluster instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Validate ELBv2 protocols that require certificates have a certificate specified
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3676] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using HTTP or TLS you must specify a certificate

name: Validate Lambda using ZipFile requires an allowable runtime
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3677] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Using the ZipFile attribute requires a javascript or python runtime to be specified

name: Using the ZipFile attribute requires a runtime to be specified
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3678] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Using the ZipFile attribute requires a runtime to be specified

name: Validate ELB protocols that require certificates have a certificate specified
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3679] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using HTTPS or SSL you must provide a certificate

name: Application load balancers require at least 2 subnets
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3680] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message:

name: Validate when using Aurora certain properies aren't required
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3682] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When creating an aurora DBInstance don't specify 'AllocatedStorage', 'BackupRetentionPeriod', 'CopyTagsToSnapshot', 'DeletionProtection', 'EnableIAMDatabaseAuthentication', 'MasterUserPassword', or 'StorageEncrypted'

name: Validate allowed properties when using a serverless RDS DB cluster
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3686] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate that when EngineMode is 'serverless' or 'provisioned' that the appropriate allowed properties are provided. If 'EngineMode' is not provided make sure serverless properties don't exist at all.

name: Validate to and from ports based on the protocol
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3687] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using icmp, icmpv6, tcp, or udp you have to specify the to and from port ranges

name: Validate that to and from ports are both -1
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3688] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When ToPort or FromPort are -1 the other one must also be -1

name: Validate MonitoringInterval and MonitoringRoleArn are used together
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3689] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When MonitoringInterval is greater than 0 you need to specify MonitoringRoleArn. If MonitoringRoleArn is specified MonitoringInterval has to be greather than 0.

name: Validate DB Cluster Engine and Engine Version
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3690] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate the DB Cluster engine along with the engine version

name: Validate DB Instance Engine and Engine Version
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3691] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate the DB Instance engine along with the engine version

name: Validate Multi-AZ DB cluster configuration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3692] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When creating a Multi-AZ DB Cluster there are required fields and the allowed values are different

name: Validate Aurora DB cluster configuration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3693] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When creating an Aurora DB Cluster there are required fields and the allowed values are different

name: Validates RDS DB Cluster instance class
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E3694] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates the RDS DB Cluster instance types based on region and data gathered from the pricing APIs

name: Metadata Interface have appropriate properties
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E4001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Metadata Interface properties are properly configured

name: Validate the configuration of the Metadata section
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E4002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validates that Metadata section is an object and has no null values

name: Check that Modules resources are valid
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E5001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check that Modules resources are valid

name: Check the properties of Outputs
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate the property structure for outputs

name: Outputs have required properties
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure the outputs have required properties

name: Check the type of Outputs
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6003] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate the type of properties in the Outputs section

name: Outputs have appropriate names
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6004] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if Outputs are properly named (A-Za-z0-9)

name: Validate the Output condition is valid
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6005] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the condition of an output to make sure it exists inside the template

name: Output limit not exceeded
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Outputs in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Check property names in Outputs
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate property names are property configured in Outputs

name: Validate that outputs values are a string
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6101] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Make sure that output values have a type of string

name: Validate that output exports have values of strings
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E6102] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Make sure output exports have a value of type string

name: Mappings are appropriately configured
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E7001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if Mappings are properly configured

This issue is raised by the rule [E7002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate property names are property configured in Mappings

This issue is raised by the rule [E7010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Mappings in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Conditions have appropriate properties
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if Conditions are properly configured

name: Check if the referenced Conditions are defined
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure the used conditions are actually defined in the Conditions section

name: Check Fn::Equals structure for validity
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8003] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Fn::Equals is a list of two elements

name: Check Fn::And structure for validity
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8004] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Fn::And is a list of two elements

name: Check Fn::Not structure for validity
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8005] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Fn::Not is a list of one element

name: Check Fn::Or structure for validity
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8006] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Fn::Or is a list of two elements

name: Check Condition structure for validity
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [E8007] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Condition has a value of another condition

name: Validate approaching the template size limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I1002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the size of the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Validate if we are approaching the max size of a description
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I1003] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if the size of the template description is approaching the upper limit

name: Use Sub instead of Join
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I1022] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Prefer a sub instead of Join when using a join delimiter that is empty

name: Parameter limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I2010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Parameters in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Parameter name limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I2011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the size of Parameter names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Validate that SnapStart is configured for >= Java11 runtimes
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I2530] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: SnapStart is a no-cost feature that can increase performance up to 10x. Enable SnapStart for Java 11 and greater runtimes

name: Resource limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Resources in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Check stateful resources have a set UpdateReplacePolicy/DeletionPolicy
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: The default action when replacing/removing a resource is to delete it. This check requires you to explicitly set policies

name: Resource name limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3012] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the size of Resource names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Check resources with auto expiring content have explicit retention period
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3013] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: The behaviour for data retention is different across AWS Services.If no retention period is specified the default for some services is to delete the data after a period of time.This check requires you to explicitly set the retention period for those resources to avoid unexpected data losses

name: Check if a list that allows duplicates has any duplicates
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3037] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Certain lists support duplicate items.Provide an alert when list of strings or numbers have repeats.

name: ARNs should use correctly placed Pseudo Parameters
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3042] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Checks Resources if ARNs use correctly placed Pseudo Parameters instead of hardcoded Partition, Region, and Account Number

name: Checks for legacy instance type generations
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I3100] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: New instance type generations increase performance and decrease cost

name: Output limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I6010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Outputs in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Output name limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I6011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the size of Output names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Mapping name limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I7002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the size of Mapping names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Mapping limit
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [I7010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the number of Mappings in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Ref/GetAtt to resource that is available when conditions are applied
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check the Conditions that affect a Ref/GetAtt to make sure the resource being related to is available when there is a resource condition.

name: Instead of REFing a parameter for a secret use a dynamic reference
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Instead of REFing a parameter for a secret use a dynamic reference. Solutions like SSM parameter store and secrets manager provide better security of sercrets

name: Validate that parameters to a Fn::Sub are used
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1019] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate that Fn::Sub Parameters are used

name: Sub isn't needed if it doesn't have a variable defined
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1020] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Checks sub strings to see if a variable is defined.

name: Check Fn::If has a path that cannot be reached
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1028] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check Fn::If path can be reached

name: Validate the values that come from a Ref function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1030] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Ref and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::Sub function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1031] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::Sub and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::Join function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1032] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::Join and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::Split function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1033] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::Split and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::FindInMap function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1034] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::FindInMap and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::Select function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1035] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::Select and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::GetAZs function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1036] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::GetAZs and then validate the values against the schema

name: Validate the values that come from a Fn::ToJsonString function
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W1040] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Resolve the Fn::ToJsonString and then validate the values against the schema

name: Check if Parameters are Used
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure the parameters defined are used

name: NoEcho parameters are not masked when used in Metadata and Outputs
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Using the NoEcho attribute does not mask any information stored in the following: Metadata, Outputs, Resource Metadata

name: Check if parameters have a valid value
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2030] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if parameters have a valid value in case of an enumator. The Parameter's allowed values is based on the usages in property (Ref)

name: Check if parameters have a valid value based on an allowed pattern
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2031] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if parameters have a valid value in a pattern. The Parameter's allowed pattern is based on the usages in property (Ref)

name: Check if Password Properties are correctly configured
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2501] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Password properties should not be strings and if parameter using NoEcho

name: Check if ImageId Parameters have the correct type
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2506] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: See if there are any refs for ImageId to a parameter of inappropriate type. Appropriate Types are [AWS::EC2::Image::Id, AWS::SSM::Parameter::Value]

name: Check IAM Resource Policies syntax
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2511] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: See if the elements inside an IAM Resource policy are configured correctly.

name: Validate that SnapStart is properly configured
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2530] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: To properly leverage SnapStart, you must configure both the lambda function and attach a Lambda version resource

name: Check if EOL Lambda Function Runtimes are used
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2531] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if an EOL Lambda Runtime is specified and give a warning if used.

name: Check required properties for Lambda if the deployment package is a .zip file
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W2533] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When the package type is Zip, you must also specify the `handler` and `runtime` properties.

name: Warn when properties are configured to only work with the package command
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3002] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Some properties can be configured to only work with the CloudFormationpackage command. Warn when this is the case so user is aware.

name: Check obsolete DependsOn configuration for Resources
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3005] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if DependsOn is specified if not needed. A Ref or a Fn::GetAtt already is an implicit dependency.

name: Availability zone properties should not be hardcoded
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3010] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if an Availability Zone property is hardcoded.

name: Check resources with UpdateReplacePolicy/DeletionPolicy have both
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3011] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Both UpdateReplacePolicy and DeletionPolicy are needed to protect resources from deletion

name: Check if parameter values are between min and max
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3034] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if parameter values value being between the minimum and maximum

name: Check IAM Permission configuration
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3037*] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check for valid IAM Permissions

name: Controlling access to an S3 bucket should be done with bucket policies
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3045] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Nearly all access control configurations can be more successfully achieved with bucket policies. Consider using bucket policies instead of access control.

name: Validate SourceAccount is required property
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3663] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When configuration a Lambda permission with a SourceArn that doesn't have an AccountId you should also specify the SourceAccount

name: Validate that ports aren't specified for certain protocols
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3687] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When using a protocol other than icmp, icmpv6, tcp, or udp the port ranges properties are ignored

name: When restoring DBCluster certain properties are ignored
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3688] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When creating a DBCluster extra properties are ignored and could result in drift

name: When using a source DB certain properties are ignored
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W3689] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: When creating a DBCluster from a source certain properties are ignored and could result in drift

name: Metadata Interface parameters exist
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W4001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Metadata Interface parameters actually exist

name: Validate cfnlint configuration in the Metadata
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W4005] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Metadata cfn-lint configuration has many values and we want to validate that

name: Check Outputs using ImportValue
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W6001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Check if the Output value is set using ImportValue, so creating an Output of an Output

name: Check if Mappings are Used
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W7001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure the mappings defined are used

name: Check if Conditions are Used
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W8001] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Making sure the conditions defined are used

name: Fn::Equals will always return true or false
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [W8003] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: Validate Fn::Equals to see if its comparing two strings or two equal items. While this works it may not be intended.

name: Cfn-lint Rule
description:
This issue is raised by the rule [cfn-lint.fallback] from "AWS CloudFormation Linter" (aka cfn-lint). This is not an issue raised by Sonar analyzers.

AWS CloudFormation Linter Message: This reporting may be triggered by a custom cfn-lint rule or by a default cfn-lint rule that has not yet been added to the Sonar IaC analyzer.
